title: Skin Idea "Demon Slayer Yasou"
body:
The skin would look like the image as shown however it would also have blue flame effects with all his ability's 

if you have any other ideas to add to this feel free to say so

replies.body:
Awesome idea dude :D
But no offence it kinda looks the same as Project: Yasuo
Why make skins for champs that already have more than 1 skin.

Sorry, but I think I've had enough with all the HideoKojimaBreakDancingCyborgNinja references from PROJECT.

{{item:3074}} for life!

I would so buy this skin hahah
it would be cool to somehow incorporate the character Sesshomaru into the design somehow as yasuo is loosely based off him and he is a demon as well

Seems like a bit like Bleach but damn!

Good idea.
